CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Administrative Support relative to Management Team?
SRP.A: Administrative Support is {above} Management Team in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Sales Team}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Administrative Support}.

VE.Q: What is Management Team's Absenteeism Rate in 1979?
VE.A: Management Team's absenteeism rate in 1979 is {1.92} %.

VE.Q: What is Research & Development's Absenteeism Rate in 1967?
VE.A: Research & Development's absenteeism rate in 1967 is {5.04} %.

VE.Q: What is Operations Staff's Absenteeism Rate in 1978?
VE.A: Operations Staff's absenteeism rate in 1978 is {0.69} %.

VE.Q: What are the absenteeism rate of Research & Development, Management Team, and Operations Staff in 1968?
VE.A: Research & Development's absenteeism rate is {5.22} %, Management Team's absenteeism rate is {3.27} %, Operations Staff's absenteeism rate is {2.10} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Absenteeism Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum absenteeism rate is {0.04} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Absenteeism Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum absenteeism rate is {43.29} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Absenteeism Rate level recorded for Administrative Support?
What is the lowest Absenteeism Rate level recorded for Administrative Support?
EVJ.A: Administrative Support's lowest recorded level is approximately {0.04} % in {1979}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Absenteeism Rate?
SC.A: The average total absenteeism rate is {28.62} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate go below 20.76 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate exceed 31.36 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate fall between 24.76 and 27.36 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Absenteeism Rate in 1979 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total absenteeism rate in 1979 was {lower} than in 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1983, was the average total Absenteeism Rate higher or lower than between 1972 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total absenteeism rate between 1975 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1972 and 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1984, did the total Absenteeism Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1963 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total absenteeism rate between 1967 and 1984 was {smaller} than between 1963 and 1987.

NC.Q: Was the total Absenteeism Rate in 1965 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total absenteeism rate in 1965 was {lower} than in 1986.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Sales Team} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Administrative Support, Operations Staff, Management Team, Research & Development, Sales Team}.
